author: TNW Deals
title: This highly-reviewed language learning app will keep you busy while stuck at home
description: You can actually get the most out of your trip — and training from Babbel Language Learning can certainly help. Right now, you can get a lifetime subscription to all the materials for learning up to 14 different languages for only $159, 60 percent off the reg…
content:
TLDR: Start prepping for post-virus world travel now with a lifetime subscription to Babbel Language Learning, now 60% off.
One way not to get too beaten down by current events is to start planning for what to do once its all over. Sure, no one knows the twi… [+2405 chars]
